vocabInfos.mediumDef:
guardian, an officer of the court
or Melzar - a man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Dan.1.11; also translated "steward";
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 巴比倫的一個官職,意思不明確,可能是"監護人"的意思 (但 1:11,16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 巴比伦的一个官职,意思不明确,可能是"监护人"的意思 (但 1:11,16)
